overview: Marinduque, an island province in the Philippines 172 kilometers south of Manila, is where the largest mining disaster in the countryâ€™s history occurred. MINA, an environmental activist trying to make ends meet financially, sets out on a journey to Marinduque to seek answers to the mining disaster. She joins a secret organization led by FRANCIS who feeds her confidential information regarding the people responsible for the tragedy.
title: Unconscious Memory
